mapper.insert: insert into leaveapplication (student_id, course_id, reason, leave_place, appeal_begin_time, appeal_end_time, status,leaveCourseName) values (#{studentId},#{courseId},#{reason},#{leavePlace},#{appealBeginTime},#{appealEndTime},#{status},#{leaveCourseName})
mapper.update: update leaveapplication set status=#{status} where id=#{leaveId};
